title: Assignments
content:
Assigned problems are from the course textbook: Bertsimas, Dimitris, and Robert Weismantel. Optimization over Integers. Belmont, MA: Dynamic Ideas, 2005. ISBN: 9780975914625.
ASSN # ASSIGNMENTS DUE DATES 1 1.2, 1.7, 1.21, 1.23 Lec #3 2 2.1, 2.9, 2.15, 2.20 Lec #7 3 3.13, 3.14, 3.15, 3.19, 3.21 Lec #11 4
4.10, 4.11, 4.12, 5.8
Lec #13 (Optional)
You are encouraged to work on these problems to prepare for the exam.
If you choose to submit solutions, they will be considered in your HW grade for the course.
5 (PDF) Lec #19 6 9.2b, 9.4, 9.8, 11.3, 11.5, 11.12a, 11.15 Lec #24
